## Summary statistics

R is a giant calculator


### Overall summary

Whole dataframe
```{r}
summary(frogarms)
```

Just a single column
```{r}
summary(frogarms$mass)
```



### Individual summary stats

```{r}
mean(frogarms$mass)
```

```{r}
var(frogarms$mass)
```
